evidence.text: consolidated the preliminary injunction hearing on the remaining claims with a trial on the merits under Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 65(a)(2).

extracted.value: Consolidated preliminary injunction hearing on the remaining claims with a trial on the merits under Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 65(a)(2).

evidence.text: The two informally consolidated cases now before the Court were brought by, first, a group of individual researchers, doctors, and unions, and, second, a coalition of 16 States, suing on behalf of their public universities.

extracted.value: Two informally consolidated cases: first, a group of individual researchers, doctors, and unions; second, a coalition of 16 states suing on behalf of their public universities.

evidence.text: After this Court collapsed the separate motions for preliminary injunctions into a single consolidated trial pursuant to Rule 65(a),
